title: Quality information.
body:
http://i.gyazo.com/629a19b86203366d386b67b99d5ab766.png

Thanks for telling me what post was removed so I know what I actually did. Almost as bad as the lackluster warnings in-game.
My posts share the same over-all quality of this game. Wait..

replies.body:
> > Woah, you're rude.
> 
> And you're annoying...

And you're much better? ALl I see you post is sucking up, get your own opinion please and stop trying to please people.
